@@ -0,0 +1,12 @@
+! { dg-do run }
+!
+! Check that pr 70697 is fixed.
+
+program event_4
+  use iso_fortran_env
+  integer :: nc(1)
+  type(event_type) done[*]
+  nc(1) = 1
+  event post(done[1])
+  event wait(done,until_count=nc(1))
+end
